name: Lafayette Radio Electronics Corporation v. Jonnel Enterprises, Inc., Appellant
name_abbreviation: Lafayette Radio Electronics Corp. v. Jonnel Enterprises, Inc.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
parties: Lafayette Radio Electronics Corporation v. Jonnel Enterprises, Inc., Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed; costs on appellant.
Mr. Justice Jones and Mr. Justice Roberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Aaron Rosenzweig, with him Samuel M. Rosenzweig, and Rosenzioeig & Rosenzweig, for appellant.
Norman J. Gowie, with him Thomson, Rhodes & Grigsby, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Lafayette Radio Electronics Corporation v. Jonnel Enterprises, Inc., Appellant.
Argued March 17,1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Aaron Rosenzweig, with him Samuel M. Rosenzweig, and Rosenzioeig & Rosenzweig, for appellant.
Norman J. Gowie, with him Thomson, Rhodes & Grigsby, for appellee.
December 20, 1971:
